issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5. Feature request description

Code Analyzer is analyzing the Alloy compiled code included into the 'Resources' folder - as a result, we could get errors or warnings relative to Alloy generated portions of code which is not linked to user created original code included in the 'App' folder, but only present in the compiled code in the 'Resources' folder.

This behavior could be confusing from the end user perspective, that could experience 'false' error reports relative to 'Resources' files in the results.

Code Analyzer should sort between user-generated code errors/warnings and Alloy compiler generated.
fields.summary: Code Analyzer : Alloy: results Error or Warnings should be sorted between user-generated code and Alloy compiler generated code

comments.body: Closing ticket as code processor is no longer supported.
